entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @realDonaldTrump At least he reads. You didn't read Russia bounty briefing because  it wasnt about you. You dont keep up with #coronavirus because its not about you. A real president like #ObamaWasBetterAtEverything carried the load, recovered the economy, & dominated #putin
